Hartford.Isham-Terry House: The Isham-Terry House is a historic house museum at 211 High Street in Hartford, Connecticut. Built about 1854, it was from 1896 home to members of the Isham family, who restored it in the early 20th century. The family donated the property to Connecticut Landmarks in the 1970s, which now operates it has a museum, offering guided tours and facility event rentals.
